x	y	x+y				M x 2^E					round to nearest		round up
64	2^20	(100000000000001000000)		(1.00000000000001) x 2^20		(100000000000001000000)		(100000000000001000000.001)
64	2^-20	(1000000.00000000000000000001)	(1.00000000000000000000000001) x 2^6	(1000000)			(1000000.00000000000000001)
32	2^-20	(100000.00000000000000000001)	(1.0000000000000000000000001) x 2^5	(100000)			(100000.000000000000000001)
16	2^-20	(10000.00000000000000000001)	(1.000000000000000000000001) x 2^4	(10000)				(10000.0000000000000000001)
 8	2^-20	(1000.00000000000000000001)	(1.00000000000000000000001) x 2^3	(1000.00000000000000000010)	(1000.00000000000000000010)
